name: Sole Slash
description:
Sole Slash is an online multiplayer weapon-based fighting game where one-hit is all it takes to defeat your opponents. Traverse and teleport through a variety of different arenas to defend yourself from foes.

Credits:

Game Director: Jonas Noronha

Gameplay Programmer: Raynor D’Souza

Graphic Programmer: Aryan Bendray

Orion Character Artist: Brad Medina

Orion Character Animators: Dalia Abdelmeguid & S. Sen

Music Producers: Jason Baretto, Samuel Sabu & Deep Naha

Sound Designer: Aramazd Tcholakian

Poster Graphic Designer: Dareen Maisara

Poster Character Artist: Iman AlSari

Special thanks to Mustafa Sibai and Muhammad Hamze for facilitating this project!

If you'd like the chance to connect with a potential intern or hire, please complete the industry connect form and our Centre of Industry Engagement will be in touch with you: https://forms.gle/ADJPu2jz8HFzvDh78

If you would like to talk to the team to understand the project better or for any questions or feedback that you may have, please join the video meeting link from any time between 5PM to 6PM on 10th January: https://meet.google.com/dde-brfr-cij
